subject: Boston Marathon Bombings (2013)
Therapy and Rehabilitation
Amputation
Legs
Physical Therapy
lead_paragraph: Jeff Bauman went to the 2013 Boston Marathon to cheer for his girlfriend. In one flash, his life changed and an arduous road to recovery began.
snippet: Jeff Bauman went to the 2013 Boston Marathon to cheer for his girlfriend. In one flash, his life changed and an arduous road to recovery began.
